title: Jobs People Do

vocab.definition: Work that people do to help others and earn money
A person who helps sick people get better
A person who helps children learn
Someone who does things to make life better for others

teachingNotes: Invite community workers to visit. Use dramatic play area for job role-playing. Discuss how jobs help the community.

sample.question: What does a doctor use to listen to your heart?
Who helps you check out books at the library?

truefalse.question: A mail carrier brings letters to your house.
expectedAny: mail carriers deliver mail to homes

truefalse.question: Police officers help keep people safe.
Only men can have jobs.
expectedAny: both men and women have jobs

truefalse.question: Jobs help make our community work.
All jobs require the same tools.

multiplechoice.question: Who would you call if you were sick?
Who helps you when you're lost?

fillintheblank.question: A _____ grows food for people to eat.
A _____ paints pictures and makes art.
A _____ takes care of sick animals.
A _____ plays music for people to enjoy.

shortanswer.question: What job would you like to have when you grow up? Why?
How do jobs help our community?
What tools does a firefighter use?
What would happen if we didn't have jobs?
How do farmers help everyone?
expectedAny: provide what we need to eat

wordProblems.question: Dr. Smith saw 8 patients in the morning and 5 patients in the afternoon. How many patients did she see total?
The firefighter rescued 3 cats from trees and 2 cats from buildings. How many cats did he rescue?
The baker made 15 loaves of bread. She sold 9 loaves. How many loaves does she have left?
The mail carrier had 20 letters to deliver. After delivering 12 letters, how many letters does he still need to deliver?
The teacher has 25 students in her class. If 3 students are absent today, how many students are in class?
The construction worker used 7 boards yesterday and 6 boards today. How many boards did he use in total?
The farmer has 18 chickens. If 4 chickens laid eggs today, how many chickens didn't lay eggs?
